alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 2:44PM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM CHRISTMAS THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow expected. Total snow accumulations mainly between 1 and 3 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as around 40 MPH on Monday, but decreasing to 20 to 35 MPH Tuesday into Wednesday. * WHERE...Mitchell, Osborne, and Rooks Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact Christmas and post-Christmas travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even with this storm so close in time, there is still some uncertainty in the snowfall forecast, and further upward or downward adjustments are quite possible. Even if snow amounts end up being closer to the lower end range of possibilities, strong winds will still cause travel issues due to blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
